description: Reserved matters application in relation to Outline Planning Permission reference 19/3092 (as amended by 23/2773) for access, appearance, landscaping, layout and scale for Demolition of existing building and erection of a 10 storey building with basement level comprising 54 residential units on upper floors (Use Class C3), commercial work space (Use Class E) on basement and ground floors with ancillary cafe, landscaping, wheelchair car parking, cycle and refuse storage
